CustomField.description: When set to TRUE forces a recalculation of the $ figures across all Actions & Time Logs. This is to provide clients with the ability to adjust rates on the project and do a mass recalculation.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: When set to TRUE forces a recalculation of the $ figures across all Actions & Time Logs. This is to provide clients with the ability to adjust rates on the project and do a mass recalculation.
CustomField.label: Force Financials Recalculation
